message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you the exclusive opportunity to acquire this incredible product. Given its unique value and potential, I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.  I'm initially proposing a price of $1,900,000. This is a rare opportunity, and I believe this price accurately reflects the asset's worth.

I appreciate your initial offer, Alice, but I'm looking to make a more reasonable deal. Considering the product's value, I'm willing to pay $1,700,000. I believe this price is still a fair reflection of the product's worth, but I'm open to negotiations.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I've considered your perspective, and while I recognize your valuation,  I'm aiming for a price closer to $1,850,000. This product has generated significant interest, and I'm confident in its ability to deliver exceptional value. I believe this adjusted price reflects a fair compromise.

I understand your perspective, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $1,750,000. I believe this is a fair compromise, considering the product's value and our previous discussions.
